name: Hunt: Showdown - Limited Bounty Hunter Edition
summary: Hunt: Showdown is a thrilling, high-stakes PvPvE first-person shooter. Take down nightmarish monsters, as you compete for the bounties that will bring you glory, gear, and gold in this unforgiving and unforgettable online multiplayer experience.
